segments.content: . this article was motivated by the discovery of a potential new foundation for mainstream mathematics . the goal is to clarify the relationships between primitives, foundations, and deductive practice .

dations are a way to analyze the body of practice, particularly its consistency . a foundation is consistent if every chain of deductions that produces a contradiction can be shown to have a logical error . success is sensitively dependent on everything else used in the argument being completely reliable .

by 1900 quite a few mathematicians had found nave set theory effective and reliable . by 1900 they gave up trying to define sets directly, and instead began abstracting key properties . the standard forms of the axioms up to this point are mainly due to zermillo .

ve logic of object generators is non-binary in the sense that we might assert that x, y are the same, but in general there is no (yes, no)-valued function that can detect this . the first step toward set theory is to establish a sub-context that does use binary logic .
